Package fr.istic.cartaylor.api

Interface Configuration

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConfigurationImpl
public interface Configuration
A public type containing a user configuration.
Author:
plouzeau

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clear()
    Clear all the configuration, i.e. remove all selected parts.
    java.util.Set<Part> getSelectedParts()
    Returns selected parts.
    java.util.Optional<Part> getSelectionForCategory​(Category category)
    Returns selected part of given category.
    boolean isComplete()
    Tests if the configuration is complete, i.e. all categories have been configured.
    boolean isValid()
    Tests if the configuration is complete and valid.
    void selectPart​(Part chosenPart)
    Select a part.
    void unselectPartType​(Category categoryToClear)
    Clear a category, i.e. remove selected part for this category.

  • Method Details

    • isValid

      boolean isValid()
      Tests if the configuration is complete and valid. A valid configuration is a complete configuration where all requirements are satisfied and there are no incompatibilities.
      Returns:
      true if the configuration is valid, false otherwise.

    • isComplete

      boolean isComplete()
      Tests if the configuration is complete, i.e. all categories have been configured.
      Returns:
      true if the configuration is complete, false otherwise.

    • getSelectedParts

      java.util.Set<Part> getSelectedParts()
      Returns selected parts.
      Returns:
      Set of selected parts (immutable)

    • selectPart

      void selectPart​(Part chosenPart)
      Select a part. If a part was already selected for chosenPart's category, it is replaced by the new part.
      Parameters:
      chosenPart - Part to select

    • getSelectionForCategory

      java.util.Optional<Part> getSelectionForCategory​(Category category)
      Returns selected part of given category.
      Parameters:
      category - Category
      Returns:
      On optional containing the selected part for given category, or an empty optional if no part was selected.

    • unselectPartType

      void unselectPartType​(Category categoryToClear)
      Clear a category, i.e. remove selected part for this category. If no parts are selected, nothing happens.
      Parameters:
      categoryToClear - Category to clear

    • clear

      void clear()
      Clear all the configuration, i.e. remove all selected parts.
